overview: Awakening from a decade long coma Serena Blairs first request is to tend to her long-overdue sexual appetite, and the only woman that can fix her fever is Dr Angela White herself. When Eva Lovia leaves the room to take a break from tutoring Scarlett Sage, Scarlett takes this opportunity to look through Evas laptop, snooping in her personal files. When Scarlett finds explicit ??materials she shows her teacher what she found and if she doesn't help her pass her class, she will reveal Eva's dirty little secret. Cherie DeVille is rightly furious after discovering that she had been cheated on, but gets an idea in her mind about getting revenge on her wife Aaliyah. Looking over at sexy Lexi Belle sitting on her couch she begins to make a move. Cherie will be settling the score tonight by scoring a hottie herself!
title: Awakening
